text: Vladimir "Vladica" Popović (; 17 March 1935 – 10 August 2020) was a Serbian footballer and manager. He won the Intercontinental Cup with Red Star Belgrade in 1991. He played for the Yugoslavia national football team from 1956 to 1965. Popović died in Belgrade on 10 August 2020, aged 85.Perfil de Vladimir Popovic tecnico yugoeslavio fallecido ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian football managers
title: Vladica Popović
